Classification: Scripted
Genre: Action | Drama
Status: New Series
Network: ABC ( USA)
Airs: Sundays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: March 03, 2013
Episode Order: 8

The widow (Radha Mitchell) of an assassinated criminal is forced to adopt her husband's role in a crime syndicate in order to protect her family.
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-31717)

I'm suspicious.  Red Widow doesn't run until 3/3/13 on ABC.  So what's it doing running on Hulu before it premieres on ABC this evening of Saturday, 3/2/2013?  I don't believe it.  Besides, if its Hulu, its streaming, which is not high quality enough to be downloading?
